alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued June 20 at 10:10PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A HIGH SURF ADVISORY is IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY... WHAT...Surf heights of 10 to 13 feet building to 12 to 14 feet will impact WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands WHEN...Through Saturday IMPACTS...Large breaking waves, dangerous rip currents, and localized beach erosion is possible, especially during high tides. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1010 PO ASO LUA IUNI 20 2023 ...UA IAI nei LE FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE Aso TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga e 10 i le 13 futu si`isi`i i le 12 i le 14 futu o le a aafia ai gataifale NOFOAGA...i saute ma sasa`e o le atunu`u TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Toona`i AAFIAGA...E fafati maualuluga galu, malolosi aave o le sami, ma e tafiesea nofoaga tu-matafaga, ae maise lava taimi e sua ai le tai. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
